abstract: Republican presidential candidates appear ready to set aside their priority on fiscal discipline to come together on issue of tighter security along 2,000-mile border with Mexico; proposals for longer or higher border fence have drawn cheers at Republican rallies, raising questions of practicality and effectiveness, not to mention cost.
snippet: Questions of practicality and effectiveness are raised as Republican candidates call for a longer or higher border fence.
lead_paragraph: Questions of practicality and effectiveness are raised as Republican candidates call for a longer or higher border fence.

headline.main: Some Cheer Border Fence as Others Ponder the Cost
headline.print_headline: Some Cheer Border Fence As Others Ponder the Cost
